abstract: The state passed a law that says online companies must collect sales tax on purchases by Californians, which an antitax group is trying to roll back.
snippet: The state passed a law that says online companies must collect sales tax on purchases by Californians, which an antitax group is trying to roll back.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Amazon said Monday that it would back a California ballot initiative that would roll back a new state law that forces more online retailers to collect sales tax.

headline.main: Amazon Backs End to Online Sales Tax in California
headline.print_headline: Amazon Backs End to Online Sales Tax in California

byline.original: By Matt Richtel and Verne G. Kopytoff
